cast.overview: Follow Robbie Williams' journey from childhood, to being the youngest member of chart-topping boyband Take That, through to his unparalleled achievements as a record-breaking solo artist – all the while confronting the challenges that stratospheric fame and success can bring.
cast.title: Better Man

details.biography: Steven has worked with many of the countries top directors including  Danny Boyle, Roger Michell, Nick Hytner, Terry Hands, Deborah Warner and  Michael Attenborough. He played the role of Sergeant Jake Bridges in  the BBC drama series Judge John Deed Steven trained at the Royal Welsh  College of Music and Drama and has worked with the top professional  theaters throughout the UK including the Royal Shakespeare Company,  Royal National Theatre, National Theatre Wales and Abbey Theatre, Dublin  where he played the Welshman, Gerry Evans in Brian Friel's 'Dancing At  Lughnasa' on two occasions.
details.name: Steven Elliot
